name: winterberry
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a kind of holly (= a bush or small tree with shiny, sharp leaves, and small, round, red fruit) that grows in eastern parts of North America, or the fruits that grow on it: Unlike most hollies, the winterberry (Ilex verticillata) is deciduous. You can fill buckets with branches of winterberries for an original decorative touch. The bare trees still have bright orange-red winterberries clinging to their branches.
More examplesFewer examplesI gathered crab apple, winterberry, and swamp maple from the woods.Winterberry is one of the rare deciduous shrubs that provide interest in the garden at all times of the year.
